title: hara hara shiva hari
sahitya:
hara hara shiva hari hariyena ariya nAmam japippOm


anupallavi

  para guruvara sura nAraNa pashupati shuddha paripUraNa


caraNam    akara ukara makaramAna akSara shruti kUDa 
makara yAzhum kuzhalum kuralum maddaLattuDan pADa
ihapara sukham aruLum sat-cit inbamayanai anbu sheidE
